item.title: Jill add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Jill add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "When I looked at you, my life made sense. Even the bad things made sense. They were necessary to make you possible." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jill add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "The beginning of love is the will to let those we love be perfectly themselves, the resolution not to twist them to fit our own image." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Jill add a quote by Andrew Sean Greer
item.description: "We are each the love of someone's life." -- Andrew Sean Greer

item.title: Jill add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "Whether I shall turn out to be the hero of my own life, or whether that station will be held by anybody else, these pages must show." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Jill add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "Book collecting is an obsession, an occupation, a disease, an addiction, a fascination, an absurdity, a fate. It is not a hobby. Those who do it must do it. Those who do not do it, think of it as a cousin of stamp collecting, a sister of the trophy cabinet, bastard of a sound bank account and a weak mind." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Jill add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Jill add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Jill add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "Every traveler has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Jill add a quote by Richard Russo
item.description: "People sometimes get in the habit of being loyal to a mistake." -- Richard Russo

item.title: Jill add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Perhaps it's impossible to wear an identity without becoming what you pretend to be." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Jill add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "Reality doesn't impress me. I only believe in intoxication, in ecstasy, and when ordinary life shackles me, I escape, one way or another. No more walls." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jill add a quote by Elizabeth Gaskell
item.description: "How easy it is to judge rightly after one sees what evil comes from judging wrongly." -- Elizabeth Gaskell

item.title: Jill add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "Well, my dear, take heart. Some day, I will kiss you and you will like it. But not now, so I beg you not to be too impatient." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Jill add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "I can't think about that right now. If I do, I'll go crazy. I'll think about that tomorrow." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Jill add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "All of us take pride and pleasure in the fact that we are unique, but I'm afraid that when all is said and done the police are right: it all comes down to fingerprints." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Jill add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Do your thing and don't care if they like it." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Jill add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Love the world and yourself in it, move through it as though it offers no resistance, as though the world is your natural element." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Jill add a quote by Tom Perrotta
item.description: "He made me think of all the books I hadn't read, and all the ones I'd read but hadn't fully understood." -- Tom Perrotta

item.title: Jill add a quote by Annie Proulx
item.description: "You know, one of the tragedies of real life is that there is no background music." -- Annie Proulx

item.title: Jill add a quote by Zadie Smith
item.description: "The past is always tense, the future perfect." -- Zadie Smith

item.title: Jill add a quote by Alice Munro
item.description: "We say of some things that they can't be forgiven, or that we will never forgive ourselves. But we do-we do it all the time." -- Alice Munro

item.title: Jill add a quote by Kazuo Ishiguro
item.description: "There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one." -- Kazuo Ishiguro

item.title: Jill add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "Underneath this veneer of slightly crazy and mildly socially retarded, I'm a complete disaster." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Jill add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
Jill add a quote by Abraham Verghese
item.description: "You live it forward, but understand it backward." -- Abraham Verghese

item.title: Jill add a quote by Abraham Verghese
item.description: "Not only our actions, but also our omissions, become our destiny." -- Abraham Verghese

item.title: Jill add a quote by Ian Fleming
item.description: "Never say 'no' to adventures. Always say 'yes,' otherwise you'll lead a very dull life." -- Ian Fleming
